Plot: Betsy, a small-town waitress, offers a warm meal to an enigmatic drifter in a rundown diner. Little does she know she's let a vicious and calculative werewolf loose on the diner's colorful population.
Title: End of the Road
Actors: Elester Latham, Tatum Langton, Dmitrious Bistrevsky, Randall Wulff
